name: weather-icons
description: 222 weather themed icons inspired by Font Awesome and ready for Bootstrap

scripts.less-to-css: lessc less/weather-icons.less css/weather-icons.css; lessc less/weather-icons-wind.less css/weather-icons-wind.css
scripts.sass-to-css: node-sass --output-style expanded sass/weather-icons.scss > css/weather-icons.css; ./node_modules/.bin/node-sass --output-style compressed sass/weather-icons.scss > css/weather-icons.min.css; node-sass --output-style expanded sass/weather-icons-wind.scss > css/weather-icons-wind.css; node-sass --output-style compressed sass/weather-icons-wind.scss > css/weather-icons-wind.min.css
